entry.title: Build a Pritunl Slack Slash Commands with a Serverless Backend

entry.summary: Introduction For self-service automation, Slack is one of the leading platforms that it can provide. As DevOps, which also considers company administrators, we ensure team members, such as Developers or QA, are presented with their technical needs without always relying on us. In this post, we will build and deploy a Slack Slash Command for Pritunl Enterprise VPN users so they can generate th...

entry.title: Google Workspace as an external IdP for AWS IAM Identity Center

link.title: Google Workspace as an external IdP for AWS IAM Identity Center

entry.summary: Introduction Google Workspace (formerly known as GSuite) is a typical first service for companies embracing the cloud, especially startups. Google Workspace provides out-of-the-box services like email, calendar, file storage, and user identity. Google also provides a service called Google Cloud Service (GCP) for business logic or computing workloads; however, companies prefer to use other vend...
